ActionCadenceStep.name: ActionCadenceStep
ActionCadenceStep.description: Represents a step in a cadence. Use ActionCadenceStep to learn which steps belong to a cadence, and how the steps are connected to each other.

ActionCadenceId.description: The ID of the ActionCadence that this step belongs to.

AllCallsCallBackLater.description: The number of calls having the call outcome Call Back Later.

AllCallsLeftVoicemail.description: The number of calls having the call outcome Left Voicemail.

AllCallsMeaningfulConnect.description: The number of calls having the call outcome Meaningful Connect.

AllCallsNotInterested.description: The number of calls having the call outcome Not Interested.

AllCallsUncategorized.description: The number of calls where the call outcome isn’t categorized.

AllCallsUnqualified.description: The number of calls having the call outcome Unqualified.

AllEmailsBouncedCount.description: The number of emails that weren’t delivered successfully.

AllEmailsHardBouncedCount.description: The number of emails returned for a permanent reason — for example, the email address doesn’t exist. This field is available in API version 50.0 and later.

AllEmailsLinkClickedCount.description: The number of links inside an email that the target clicked during this step. Multiple clicks on the same link count towards this total. This field is available in API version 50.0 and later.

AllEmailsOpenedCount.description: The number of emails that the target opened while working on this step. Multiple opens of the same email count towards this total.

AllEmailsOutOfOfficeCount.description: The number of emails that were returned because the recipient set an out-of-office responder. Multiple replies count towards this total. This field is available in API version 50.0 and later.

AllEmailsRepliedCount.description: The number of emails that targets replied to as part of this step. Multiple replies to the same email count towards this total, This field is available in API version 50.0 and later.

AllEmailsSoftBouncedCount.description: The number of emails that were returned for temporary reasons — for example, the email is too large. This field is available in API version 50.0 and later.

AllEmailsTrackedSentCount.description: The number of emails sent by this user with engagement tracking enabled.

AllEmailsUntrackedSentCount.description: The number of emails sent by this user without engagement tracking.

AllManuallyCompletedCount.description: The number of steps manually completed.

AllOnTimeCompletedCount.description: The number of steps completed on time.

AllOverdueCompletedCount.description: The number of overdue steps that were completed.

AllTotalCallsCount.description: The number of calls that the sales rep made during this step.

BranchDefaultStepName.description: The name of the default step.

ChainedCadenceId.description: The ID of the ActionCadence for the linked action cadence. Available only if the step type is DaisyChain (meaning that another action cadence is connected to this action cadence).

GoToStepIntervalInMinutes.description: Contains information about when the step should be repeated next, in minutes. Available in API version 58.0 and later.

GoToStepIterationLimit.description: Contains the maximum number of repeat (goto) step iterations allowed. Available in API version 58.0 and later.

GoToStepName.description: If this step’s original next step was removed during an edit after activation, this field specifies the updated next step.

GraphState.description: Represents the state of the ActionCadenceStep within the step graph, or sequence, of the action cadence.

HasVariant.description: This field is valid for email and call step types. If true, the step has email or call template variants. The template variants are defined in ActionCadenceStepVariant records. Available in API version 53.0 and later.

IsImmediateWakeUp.description: Indicates whether a listener branch is immediate wake up (true) or not (false).

IsOrphan.description: If true, this step isn’t executed by the action cadence and will be deleted. Steps with IsOrphan equal to true have ParentStepName equal to null. Note To retrieve the active steps in an action cadence, include IsOrphan=false in your query. The default value is false. This field is available in API version 49.0 and later.

IsScheduledDueDateLocked.description: Indicates whether assignees can change the due date (true) or not (false). Available in API version 58.0 and later.

IsScreenFlowActive.description: Indicates whether the flow is active and can be executed (true) or not (false).

IsStepAutomationActive.description: If true, the flow referenced in the StepAutmationReference field is active. If false, the flow isn’t active. Only active flows can be executed. The default value isfalse. This field is available in API version 56.0 and later.

IsThreaded.description: This field is valid for email steps. Email steps have ActionCadence.StepType equal to SendAnEmail. If true, the email for this email step is sent as a reply to the email conversation from the previous email step. By sending the email as a reply to a previous email, customers see a "conversation" view of the emails. Only emails from the same action cadence are grouped as conversations. This field can’t be true for the first email step in an action cadence, because the first email from an action cadence must start a new conversation with the prospect. The default value is false. This field is available in API version 49.0 and later.

ParentStepName.description: The step name (ActionCadenceStep.StepName) of the previous step in the action cadence. Must contain a valid step name value unless this step is the root step. null if this step is a parent step.

RootStepId.description: The ID of the root step for this action cadence. Every action cadence has exactly one root step (so that the Salesforce API can find all the steps for this cadence).

ScheduledDaysUntilDue.description: The number of days after which this current step is due. Available in API version 58.0 and later.

ScheduledDaysUntilStart.description: The number of days when this step starts after the previous step completes. For delays of greater than one day from ScheduledStartTimeInMinutes. Available in API version 58.0 and later.

ScheduledStartDelayInMinutes.description: Any hard waits in minutes is captured in this field. Waits greater than 1 day need to set ScheduledDaysUntilStart. Available in API version 58.0 and later.

ScheduledStartTimeInMinutes.description: The specific time of day when the step starts. The time represents minutes after 00:00. Available in API version 58.0 and later.

ScreenFlowReference.description: The namespace__fullname of the screen flow. Used to describe flow objects and launch flows client side.

StepAutomationReference.description: The name of the flow that the step uses. Cadence steps can launch a cadence step flow as the step or as a cadence autolaunched flow when a rep completes the step. The format is namespace__fullName. This field is available in API version 56.0 and later.

StepComments.description: A comment that provides additional information about this step.

StepName.description: Unique identifier for this step. Generated by Salesforce.

StepTitle.description: The title given to the step when it was created.

TemplateId.description: If a template was added to this step, this field contains the template's ID. For example, if this step is a call step it can contain a template for a call script. Or, if this step is an email step, it can contain a template for an email.

Type.description: The type of step. Possible values are: AutoSendAnEmail — Salesforce automatically sends the specified email. Branch — A branch step in the action cadence. CreateTask — Used for custom steps. DaisyChain — A daisy chain step. A daisy chain step connects this action cadence to another action cadence. It must be the last step in the path. LinkedInConnection LinkedInMail ListenerBranch — A branch step for emails. MakeACall — The sales rep must call the prospect at this step. PlatformScreenFlow Root — This step is the root step for the action cadence. SendAnEmail — The sales rep must send the prospect an email at this step. Wait — A wait step tells the sales rep not to do anything at this point in the action cadence.

TypeDetail.description: More detail about the step type. If the step is a cadence step flow, this field contains the flow name. Otherwise, this field contains the same value as the Type field. This field is available in API version 56.0 and later.

UniqueEmailsLinkClickedCount.description: The number of links inside an email that the target clicked during this step. Multiple clicks on the same link aren’t counted. This field is available in API version 50.0 and later.

UniqueEmailsOpenedCount.description: The number of emails that the target opened as part of this step. Multiple openings of the same email aren’t counted. This field is available in API version 50.0 and later.

UniqueEmailsRepliedCount.description: The number of emails that targets replied to as part of this step. Multiple replies to the same email aren’t counted. This field is available in API version 50.0 and later.

WaitTimeInSeconds.description: Required if the step type is Wait. The time in seconds for this step to wait.
